attributes.action: Cut taxes on vehicle insurance for vehicles with low cabon emmisions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in an effort to encourage greener methods of transport, We the undersigned request insurance for vehicles with low carbon emissions (LPG, Bioethanol,Etc.) be reduced or even reimbursed in an effort to encourage a the change over to less polluting fuels.
